benchmark_details.name: Vending-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: Vending-Bench is a simulated environment designed to test an LLM-based agentâ€™s ability to manage a long-running business scenario: operating a vending machine, including tasks such as balancing inventories, placing orders, setting prices, and handling daily fees.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective is to evaluate long-term coherence capabilities of LLM-based agents in managing a vending machine business.

data.source: Simulated environment with agent interactions and economic modeling.
data.annotation: Automatically generated interactions based on predefined business rules and economic models.

methodology.calculation: Net Worth is calculated as the sum of cash on hand, cash not yet emptied from the vending machine, and the value of unsold products.
methodology.interpretation: Higher net worth indicates better performance in managing the vending machine business.
methodology.validation: Evaluated against human performance in completing similar tasks.
